message.content: currently several settings pages like donate and about use what appears to be bodysmall text. This is too small to read. can we replace all occurences of bodysmall with body (i.e. regular)?

content.text: I'll help you find and replace all occurrences of `bodySmall` with `body` text style in the settings pages. Let me first search for these occurrences to understand the scope of the changes needed.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
    <!-- Typography System using Inter for body text and Alegreya for large text -->
    
    <!-- Display Text - Major headings, hero text -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Display" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.DisplayLarge">
        <item name="android:fontFamily">@font/alegreya</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">32sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
        <item name="android:textColor">?attr/colorOnSurface</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Headlines - Section headers, major navigation -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Headline" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.HeadlineMedium">
        <item name="android:fontFamily">@font/alegreya</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">28sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Titles - Card titles, page titles, important text -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Title" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium">
        <item name="android:fontFamily">@font/alegreya</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.3</item>
    </style>
    
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.TitleBold" parent="AppTextAppearance.Title">
        <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- List Titles - Card titles, list item titles using Alegreya Medium for better readability -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.ListTitle" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium">
        <item name="android:fontFamily">@font/alegreya</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">500</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.3</item>
    </style>
    
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.ListTitleBold" parent="AppTextAppearance.ListTitle">
        <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">700</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Body Text - Article content, descriptions, longer text -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Body" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyLarge">
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">400</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.BodyMedium" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium">
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">400</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- UI Labels - Buttons, navigation, short UI text -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Label" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.LabelMedium">
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">500</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.LabelLarge" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.LabelLarge">
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">500</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Caption Text - Metadata, timestamps, auxiliary info -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Caption" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodySmall">
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:fontWeight">400</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.2</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Monospace - Code, technical text (using system monospace) -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.Mono" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium">
        <item name="android:fontFamily">monospace</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item>
        <item name="android:lineSpacingMultiplier">1.4</item>
    </style>
    
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.MonoBold" parent="AppTextAppearance.Mono">
        <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
    </style>
    
    <!-- Search Bar Specific -->
    <style name="AppTextAppearance.SearchBar" parent="AppTextAppearance.UIHint">
        <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:fillViewport="true">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:padding="24dp">

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/donate_title"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_title"
            android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceHeadline5"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/donate_description"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_description"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.BodySmall"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="32dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/donate_title"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <!-- Amount Selection Button Layout -->
        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/amount_chip_group"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/donate_description"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">

            <!-- Row 1: $1 and $5 -->

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:fillViewport="true">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:padding="24dp">

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/about_title"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/about_title"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.Display"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <!-- App Version -->
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/app_version_text"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.Body"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/about_title"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            tools:text="Version 1.0 (1)" />

        <!-- Credits Section -->
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/credits_title"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:text="@string/about_credits_title"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.Headline"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/app_version_text" />

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:fillViewport="true">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:padding="24dp">

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/donate_title"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_title"
            android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceHeadline5"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/donate_description"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_description"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.BodySmall"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="32dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/donate_title"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <!-- Amount Selection Button Layout -->
        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/amount_chip_group"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:gravity="center_horizontal"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/donate_description"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">

            <!-- Row 1: $1 and $5 -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/chip_amount_1"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="@string/donate_amount_1"
                    android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/chip_amount_5"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="@string/donate_amount_5" />

            </LinearLayout>

            <!-- Row 2: $10 and $25 -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                android:gravity="center"
                android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/chip_amount_10"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="@string/donate_amount_10"
                    android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/chip_amount_25"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="@string/donate_amount_25" />

            </LinearLayout>

            <!-- Row 3: Custom -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                android:gravity="center">

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/chip_amount_custom"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text="@string/donate_amount_custom" />

            </LinearLayout>

        </LinearLayout>

        <!-- Custom Amount Input -->
        <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
            android:id="@+id/custom_amount_layout"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginBottom="32dp"
            android:visibility="gone"
            app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_donate_24"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/amount_chip_group"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            tools:visibility="visible">

            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                android:id="@+id/custom_amount_input"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:hint="@string/donate_custom_amount_hint"
                android:inputType="numberDecimal"
                android:maxLines="1" />

        </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

        <!-- Donate Button -->
        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
            android:id="@+id/donate_button"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_button_text"
            android:enabled="false"
            app:icon="@drawable/ic_donate_24"
            app:iconGravity="textStart"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/custom_amount_layout"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <!-- Status Text -->
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/status_text"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBody2"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:visibility="gone"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/donate_button"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            tools:text="Processing payment…"
            tools:visibility="visible" />

        <!-- Wiki Support Section -->
        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/wiki_support_title"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_wiki_title"
            android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceHeadline5"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginTop="48dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/status_text"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/wiki_support_description"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_wiki_description"
            android:textAppearance="@style/AppTextAppearance.BodySmall"
            android:textAlignment="center"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/wiki_support_title"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
            android:id="@+id/wiki_donate_button"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:text="@string/donate_wiki_button"
            app:icon="@drawable/ic_open_in_new_24"
            app:iconGravity="textEnd"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/wiki_support_description"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"

    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <!-- Toolbar -->
    <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar
        android:id="@+id/toolbar"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize"
        android:background="?attr/colorSurface"
        android:elevation="4dp"
        app:title="@string/feedback_report_issue_title"
        app:navigationIcon="@drawable/ic_arrow_back"
        app:menu="@menu/menu_submit" />

    <!-- Scrollable Content -->
    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:fillViewport="true">

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:padding="16dp">

            <!-- Instructions -->
            <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                app:cardBackgroundColor="?attr/colorSurfaceVariant"
                app:cardElevation="0dp"
                app:strokeWidth="0dp">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="vertical"
                    android:padding="16dp">

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Report a Bug"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Help us fix the issue by providing specific details. Good bug reports include:\n• What you were trying to do\n• What actually happened\n• Steps to reproduce the problem\n• What you expected to happen instead"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodyMedium"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant" />

                </LinearLayout>

            </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

            <!-- Issue Title -->
            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
                android:id="@+id/title_input_layout"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:hint="Issue Summary"
                app:helperText="Brief description of the problem you encountered"
                app:boxBackgroundMode="outline"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"
                app:counterEnabled="true"
                app:counterMaxLength="100">

                <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                    android:id="@+id/title_input"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:inputType="textCapSentences"
                    android:maxLength="100"
                    android:maxLines="2" />

            </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

            <!-- Issue Description -->
            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
                android:id="@+id/description_input_layout"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:hint="Detailed Description"
                app:helperText="Describe what happened, what you expected to happen, and the steps to reproduce this issue"
                app:placeholderText="Example: When I tap the search button, the app crashes instead of opening the search screen. I expected it to show the search interface."
                app:boxBackgroundMode="outline"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"
                app:counterEnabled="true"
                app:counterMaxLength="2000">

                <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                    android:id="@+id/description_input"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:inputType="textMultiLine|textCapSentences"
                    android:minLines="8"
                    android:maxLines="15"
                    android:maxLength="2000"
                    android:gravity="top|start"
                    android:scrollbars="vertical" />

            </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

            <!-- Device Information Card -->
            <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                app:cardBackgroundColor="?attr/colorSurfaceVariant"
                app:cardElevation="0dp"
                app:strokeWidth="1dp"
                app:strokeColor="?attr/colorOutlineVariant">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="vertical"
                    android:padding="16dp">

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Device Information"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleSmall"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/device_info_text"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodySmall"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:fontFamily="monospace"
                        android:text="Loading device information..." />

                </LinearLayout>

            </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                android:id="@+id/submit_button"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                android:text="@string/feedback_submit_issue"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button"
                android:enabled="false" />

        </LinearLayout>

    </ScrollView>

</LinearLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical">

    <!-- Toolbar -->
    <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar
        android:id="@+id/toolbar"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize"
        android:background="?attr/colorSurface"
        android:elevation="4dp"
        app:title="@string/feedback_request_feature_title"
        app:navigationIcon="@drawable/ic_arrow_back"
        app:menu="@menu/menu_submit" />

    <!-- Scrollable Content -->
    <ScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:fillViewport="true">

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:padding="16dp">

            <!-- Instructions -->
            <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                app:cardBackgroundColor="?attr/colorSurfaceVariant"
                app:cardElevation="0dp"
                app:strokeWidth="0dp">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="vertical"
                    android:padding="16dp">

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Request a Feature"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleMedium"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Help us improve the app by suggesting new functionality. Great feature requests include:\n• Clear description of what you want\n• How the feature should work\n• Why it would be valuable\n• Real-world examples of when you'd use it"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodyMedium"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant" />

                </LinearLayout>

            </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

            <!-- Feature Title -->
            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
                android:id="@+id/title_input_layout"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:hint="Feature Summary"
                app:helperText="Brief description of the feature you'd like to see"
                app:boxBackgroundMode="outline"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"
                app:counterEnabled="true"
                app:counterMaxLength="100">

                <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                    android:id="@+id/title_input"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:inputType="textCapSentences"
                    android:maxLength="100"
                    android:maxLines="2" />

            </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

            <!-- Feature Description -->
            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
                android:id="@+id/description_input_layout"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:hint="Detailed Description"
                app:helperText="Describe exactly what the feature should do and how it should work"
                app:placeholderText="Example: Add a dark mode toggle in settings that changes the app theme to dark colors. It should remember my preference between app restarts."
                app:boxBackgroundMode="outline"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"
                app:counterEnabled="true"
                app:counterMaxLength="2000">

                <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                    android:id="@+id/description_input"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:inputType="textMultiLine|textCapSentences"
                    android:minLines="8"
                    android:maxLines="15"
                    android:maxLength="2000"
                    android:gravity="top|start"
                    android:scrollbars="vertical" />

            </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

            <!-- Use Case Section -->
            <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
                android:id="@+id/use_case_input_layout"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                android:hint="Use Case (Optional)"
                app:helperText="Explain why this feature would be valuable and how you'd use it"
                app:placeholderText="Example: I often use the app at night and the bright screen hurts my eyes. Dark mode would make it more comfortable to read."
                app:boxBackgroundMode="outline"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"
                app:counterEnabled="true"
                app:counterMaxLength="1000">

                <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
                    android:id="@+id/use_case_input"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:inputType="textMultiLine|textCapSentences"
                    android:minLines="4"
                    android:maxLines="8"
                    android:maxLength="1000"
                    android:gravity="top|start"
                    android:scrollbars="vertical" />

            </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

            <!-- Device Information Card -->
            <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
                app:cardBackgroundColor="?attr/colorSurfaceVariant"
                app:cardElevation="0dp"
                app:strokeWidth="1dp"
                app:strokeColor="?attr/colorOutlineVariant">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:orientation="vertical"
                    android:padding="16dp">

                    <TextView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:text="Device Information"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceTitleSmall"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />

                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/device_info_text"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:textAppearance="?attr/textAppearanceBodySmall"
                        android:textColor="?attr/colorOnSurfaceVariant"
                        android:fontFamily="monospace"
                        android:text="Loading device information..." />

                </LinearLayout>

            </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>

            <!-- Submit Button -->
            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                android:id="@+id/submit_button"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                android:text="@string/feedback_submit_feature"
                style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button"
                android:enabled="false" />

        </LinearLayout>

    </ScrollView>

</LinearLayout>
